title: Provides an exemption of fifty percent of a retired military employee's retirement allowance if such person has been employed, on average, twenty-five hours per wee
summary: Provides an exemption of fifty percent of a retired military employee's retirement allowance if such person has been employed, on average, twenty-five hours per week.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to tax exemptions for certain retired military personnel
